name: peptidyl arginine deiminase 4

kegg.name: Neutrophil extracellular trap formation - Homo sapiens (human)

summary: This gene is a member of a gene family which encodes enzymes responsible for the conversion of arginine residues to citrulline residues. This gene may play a role in granulocyte and macrophage development leading to inflammation and immune response. [provided by RefSeq, Jul 2008].
